BuddhaVirtue

Looks up a localized string similar to The straight word of Buddha: represents the importance of practicing honest, truthful, and benevolent communication that benefits both the speaker and the listener. Avoid speaking ill or harming someone's reputation. Do not use rude language, insults, or words that may hurt or inflict emotional suffering..
